metadata.Title: CVE-2023-29537 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
Multiple race conditions in the font initialization could have led tomemory corruption and execution of attacker-controlled code. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox for Android < 112, Firefox < 112, and Focusfor Android < 112.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-29537` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 112.0+build2-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
firefox-geckodriver - 112.0+build2-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
firefox-mozsymbols - 112.0+build2-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '112.0+build2-0ubuntu0.20.04.1').
mozjs52 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs68 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
